A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

beryllium.changelog:
- sepolicy: cleanup
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

cmi.changelog:
Firmware and vendor require V12.2.1.0.RJACNXM.

- Audio things fixed
- Optimize status bar padding
- Update Carrier Config overlay
- Performance improvement

davinci.changelog:
25/02/2021
-Fixed missing signal until a few minutes pass after boot
15/02/2021
-Fixed FOD after WFD (the screen will bright up for recognizing the fingerprint after using WFD, but works. A reboot will restore the normal behaviour as usual)
-Switched to perf kernel
-Updated blobs to MIUI 21.2.3

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

gauguin.changelog:
- Fixed d2w
- Fixed refresh rate preference values
- More misc changes/fixes

ginkgo.changelog:
- Included MiuiCamera
- Upgraded all blobs to R (MIUI 12.5 21.2.3)
- Updated graphics/sensors/DSP to LA.UM.9.11.r1-02600-NICOBAR.0
- Updated audio/wifi/usb configs from stock
- Disabled fluence audio (should solve most mic issues)
- Removed unused mlipay (ifaa) and ANT+
- Switched to qcom power hal + perf hal boosting
- Display dying under heat should be fixed
- Increase gps batch size for faster fix
- Disabled buggy display SVI (sunlight improvement)
- Switched to pixel offline charger animation
- Improved system wide sqlite performance
- Pin surfaceflinger in memory for better UI performance
- Further smoothen notch cutout
- Merged LA.UM.9.1.r1-08600-SMxxx0.0 CAF and v4.14.221 in kernel
- Added wireguard support
- Reduced touchscreen, GPU and CPU latency
- Misc optimizations and fixes

lavender.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH PLEASE
- Enable SmartCharging
- Moved XiaomiParts to System/XiaomiParts
- Audio improvements
- Use GCamGoPrebuilt instead of Snap/Camera2
- Fix Deepsleep while Bluetooth is turned on
- Enable QPower and Deep sleep at the same time
- Cleanup Wifi and Tether rro_overlays
- Cleanup Wifi packages
- Address Camera, Radio, and moar Denials
- GPS Cleanup
- Enable VR Hal
- Update Build FP for February SPL
- Enable Advance Logcat Debugging
- Fix ctl.interface_start error spams
- Enable New Google Keyboard Theme
- Force set QS Rows to 2
- SELinux Enforcing

lmi.changelog:
- Firmware and vendor require V12.2.1.0.RJKCNXM.

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.
